overview: Senior level executive with 15 years experience building, leading, and advising corporations through complex international expansion. Outstanding leadership credentials and success building, leading, and improving financial performance of small-to-mid size software organizations. Background in developing and implementing financial structure for start-up organizations. Excellent leader with a solid record of contributions leading to improved financial performance, heightened productivity, and enhanced internal controls. Jeff is currently the Vice President of Finance at Bytemobile, Inc. At Bytemobile he is a key member of the Executive Management team who helps lead strategic customer negotiations and makes key operational decisions that maximizes the company’s global market opportunities. Jeff is responsible for the integrity of all financial information and the processes and policies to maintain it.
